ValidationRule.description: Enforces that when the target metric is Revenue or Meetings Booked, the Period must be Month, and both Month Number and User must be populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( TEXT(Target_Metric__c) = "Revenue", TEXT(Target_Metric__c) = "Meetings Booked" ), OR( TEXT(Target_Period__c) <> "Month", ISBLANK(Month_Number__c), ISBLANK(User__c), TEXT(Market_Unit__c) <> TEXT(User__r.Market_Unit__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For Revenue and Meetings Booked metrics, you must select Period = Month, specify a Month Number, and assign a User. Market Unit cannot differ from Selected User's Market Unit
